column2: Hello and welcome! This is a bot for auto reservation of self-services provided by jahangostar. To start, please sign in using /signin

Please use the commands below:
/menu: show the current menu
/nextmenu: show the next week’s menu
/reserveall: reserve next week’s menu completely
/unreserveall: unreserve next week’s menu completely
/credit: show current account balance
/addfilter: add a filter
/showfilters: show a list of your filters
/deletefilter: delete a filter

/signout: quit
Sign in success!
Signed out successfully! To sign in again, use /signin
Failed to sign in! Please try again with /signin
To signin, please send your username
Great! Now please send your password
You are not signed in! Please use /signin to sign in
Here’s the current week’s menu
Here’s next week’s menu
Next week’s menu not available!

please select a filter type:

send the row number for the filter you want to delete (number behind arrow)
